code: import{useEffect}from'react';import{useWeb3React}from'@web3-react/core';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{useAppDispatch}from'state';import{fetchAchievements}from'.';export var useFetchAchievements=function useFetchAchievements(){var _useWeb3React=useWeb3React(),account=_useWeb3React.account;var dispatch=useAppDispatch();useEffect(function(){if(account){dispatch(fetchAchievements(account));}},[account,dispatch]);};export var useAchievements=function useAchievements(){var achievements=useSelector(function(state){return state.achievements.data;});return achievements;};
